analyzed: yasodharā apamukha aṭṭhārasa bhikkhunī sahassa apadāna

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ yasodharāpamukhāni aṭṭhārasabhikkhunīsahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam yasodhara apamukhāni aṭṭhārasa bhikkhunī sahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
yasodhara apamukha aṭṭhārasa bhikkhunī sahassa apadānam dasama
